Texts.Chs: 把^orange;纳米加工器^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Nanofabricator^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 也许有一天，我还会麻烦你这样的天才来帮助我....但是…我现在需要一个人思考一会儿，抱歉。
Texts.Eng: Perhaps one day I might call on your talents to help me with a little problem I am having...I'll need to consider.

Texts.Chs: 在刚开始你可能会遇到一些关于如何在不同的生物群落生存的问题，现在你可以^orange;增强自己^reset;！你需要一个^orange;纳米加工器^reset;去建造一个。
Texts.Eng: You're probably starting to have some issues surviving by now in different biomes. So let's get you building ^orange;augments^reset;! You need a ^orange;Nano Fabricator^reset; to make them. Go and build one.
